checks.name: Formatting (Prettier)
checks.description: Checks code formatting using Prettier based on .prettierrc.json

checks.name: Linting
checks.description: Checks for code style and potential errors using ESLint based on .eslintrc.json

checks.name: Type Checking (TSC)
checks.description: Performs static type checking using the TypeScript Compiler based on tsconfig.json

format.suggestion: Run 'npm run format' to fix formatting issues. If errors persist, check for syntax errors in the reported files.

lint.suggestion: Run 'npm run lint -- --fix' to automatically fix issues. Review the specific ESLint errors above and consult '.eslintrc.json' if needed.

patterns: Could not find a declaration file for module
typecheck.suggestion: Review the TypeScript error messages (TSxxxx) above. Check the mentioned file/line for type errors or missing type declarations (`@types/...`). Verify your 'tsconfig.json' settings.

patterns: Could not find a required file
build.suggestion: Build failed. Examine the build log above for specific errors (e.g., 'Module not found', 'SyntaxError', 'TypeError', TSxxxx). Check configuration files ('next.config.js', 'tsconfig.json'), dependencies ('package.json' - try running 'npm install'), and ensure environment variables are set correctly. Running 'npm run typecheck' or 'npm run lint' might reveal underlying issues.
